channel.title: Posts on The Ramblings of Josh
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Ramblings of Josh

item.title: Hi
item.description: Welcome to my blog. This is where youâ€™ll be able to read many of my ramblings about a variety of subjects, ranging from run-of-the-mill software development, to my personal experiences of burnout and the importance of placing value on your own mental health. Being self-taught, I regularly suffer from imposter syndrome. I also I have a pretty significant fear of public speaking (the title of this post is a nod to how I awkwardly join Zoom meetings at work; more to come on this in a future post).
